title: No terrorism here
author: VD
content_html:
The backpack just spontaneously decided that it didn’t want to be there anymore:

A backpack exploded in a parking garage attached to a Las Vegas hotel early Monday, killing a man who had picked it up and injuring another person, authorities said. The man had removed the backpack from atop his car when it exploded shortly after 4 a.m. on the second floor of a parking behind the Luxor hotel-casino, said Officer Bill Cassell, a police spokesman….

The Luxor is a pyramid-shaped hotel at the south end of the Las Vegas Strip.

It’s a good thing we’re fighting the terrorists in Iraq, so we don’t have to fight them here. Because once the decision is made to bring the game to our home field – a decision that doesn’t depend on what’s happening in Iraq – it’s going to be uglier than most people now imagine.

I rather expect Me So will go from denying up and down that she was calling for internment in that silly little book to claiming that she was the first to see the need for it.

The backpack just spontaneously decided that
it didn’t want to be there anymore
:
A backpack exploded in a parking garage attached to a Las Vegas hotel early Monday, killing a man who had picked it up and injuring another person, authorities said.  The man had removed the backpack from atop his car when it exploded shortly after 4 a.m. on the second floor of a parking behind the Luxor hotel-casino, said Officer Bill Cassell, a police spokesman….
The Luxor is a pyramid-shaped hotel at the south end of the Las Vegas Strip.
It’s a good thing we’re fighting the terrorists in Iraq, so we don’t have to fight them here.  Because once the decision is made to bring the game to our home field – a decision that doesn’t depend on what’s happening in Iraq – it’s going to be uglier than most people now imagine.
I rather expect Me So will go from denying up and down that she was calling for internment in that silly little book to claiming that she was the first to see the need for it.
